DTField.Name: LOCATION
DTField.Label: LOCATION
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Location reference ID.

DTField.Name: STATUS
DTField.Label: STATUS
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Determines whether the Location is active or not.

DTField.Name: PUTREGION
DTField.Label: PUTREGION
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Put Region in which the Location is set. This field will be used to set the Putaway logic in the Location.

DTField.Name: PICKREGION
DTField.Label: PICKREGION
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Pick Region in which the Location is set. This field will be used to set the Picking logic from the Location.

DTField.Name: WAREHOUSEAREA
DTField.Label: WAREHOUSEAREA
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Warehouse Area in which the Location is set. This field will be used to set the Task Assignment logic in the warehouse. See explanation below.

DTField.Name: LOCSORTORDER
DTField.Label: LOCSORTORDER
DTField.DTFieldHelp: A code determining the order according to which the Location will be approached in the walk aisle sequence.

DTField.Name: LOCTPICKYPE
DTField.Label: LOCTPICKYPE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Pick Type used to pick units from the Location (e.g. Full Pick – when the whole Load in the Location should be picked, or Partial Pick – when units can be picked from the Load in the Location).

DTField.Name: LOCSTORAGETYPE
DTField.Label: LOCSTORAGETYPE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The form of storage in the Location (e.g. frozen, pallet, etc).

DTField.Name: LOCUSAGETYPE
DTField.Label: LOCUSAGETYPE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Defines the nature of the actions that may be performed on inventory in the Location - storage, picking, etc.

DTField.Name: LOCMHTYPE
DTField.Label: LOCMHTYPE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The User/Handling Equipment type that is to handle the inventory in the Location.

DTField.Name: INVENTORY
DTField.Label: INVENTORY
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Determines whether the goods stored in the Location are part of the physical inventory.

DTField.Name: LASTCOUNTDATE
DTField.Label: LASTCOUNTDATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date on which the inventory in the Location was last counted.

DTField.Name: ACCESSTYPE
DTField.Label: ACCESSTYPE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The method according to which the Location is accessed - either Random, FIFO, or LIFO.

DTField.Name: ACCESSIBLELOADS
DTField.Label: ACCESSIBLELOADS
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The number of Loads that may be accessible in the Location.

DTField.Name: LENGTH
DTField.Label: LENGTH
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The length of the Location according to the defined warehouse measurement unit.

DTField.Name: WIDTH
DTField.Label: WIDTH
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Location physical info.

DTField.Name: HEIGHT
DTField.Label: HEIGHT
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The height of the Location according to the defined warehouse measurement unit.

DTField.Name: weight
DTField.Label: weight
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Weight of inventory in the Location - relative to system measurement unit

DTField.Name: CUBIC
DTField.Label: CUBIC
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The cubic size of the Location according to the defined warehouse measurement unit.

DTField.Name: LOADSCAPACITY
DTField.Label: LOADSCAPACITY
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The number of Loads that can be stored in the Location.

DTField.Name: PENDINGWEIGHT
DTField.Label: PENDINGWEIGHT
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The weight of inventory that is expected to be added to the Location.

DTField.Name: PENDINGCUBIC
DTField.Label: PENDINGCUBE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The cubic size of inventory expected to be added to the Location.

DTField.Name: PENDINGLOADS
DTField.Label: PENDINGLOADS
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Loads that are expected to be added to the Location.

DTField.Name: CHECKDIGITS
DTField.Label: CHECKDIGITS
DTField.DTFieldHelp: An alternative Location ID.

DTField.Name: LOOSEID
DTField.Label: LOOSEID
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Determines whether a Load will lose its ID in case it is put in the Location with another Load.

DTField.Name: AISLE
DTField.Label: AISLE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The aisle in which the Location is found.

DTField.Name: BAY
DTField.Label: BAY
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The bay in which the Location is found.

DTField.Name: LOCLEVEL
DTField.Label: LOCLEVEL
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The height of the Location from the floor according to the defined warehouse measurement unit.

DTField.Name: HEIGHTFROMFLOOR
DTField.Label: HEIGHTFROMFLOOR
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The height of the Location from the floor according to the defined warehouse measurement unit.

DTField.Name: LASTMOVEIN
DTField.Label: LASTMOVEIN
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date of the last move of inventory into the Location.

DTField.Name: LASTMOVEOUT
DTField.Label: LASTMOVEOUT
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date of the last move of inventory out of the Location.

DTField.Name: PICKSFROMLASTCOUNT
DTField.Label: PICKSFROMLASTCOUNT
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The number of picks from the Location since the last count.

DTField.Name: XCOORDINATE
DTField.Label: XCOORDINATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Location X Coordinate

DTField.Name: YCOORDINATE
DTField.Label: YCOORDINATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Location Y Coordinate

DTField.Name: ZCOORDINATE
DTField.Label: ZCOORDINATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Location Z Coordinate

DTField.Name: ADDDATE
DTField.Label: ADDDATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date on which data was added.

DTField.Name: ADDUSER
DTField.Label: ADDUSER
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The user who added the data.

DTField.Name: EDITDATE
DTField.Label: EDITDATE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The date on which data was edited.

DTField.Name: EDITUSER
DTField.Label: EDITUSER
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The user who last edited the data.
